sn3.12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena pancannam rajunam pasenadipamukhanam pancahi kamagunehi samappitanam samangibhutanam paricarayamananam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn3.12:1.14: Yato kho te rajano nasakkhimsu annamannam sannapetum.
sn3.12:2.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo te rajano etadavoca:
sn3.12:2.2: “ayama, marisa, yena bhagava tenupasankamissama; upasankamitva bhagavantam etamattham patipucchissama.
sn3.12:2.3: Yatha no bhagava byakarissati tatha nam dharessama”ti.
sn3.12:2.4: “Evam, marisa”ti kho te rajano ranno pasenadissa kosalassa paccassosum.
sn3.12:3.1: Atha kho te panca rajano pasenadipamukha yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.12:3.2: “idha, bhante, amhakam pancannam rajunam pancahi kamagunehi samappitanam samangibhutanam paricarayamananam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn3.12:3.14: Kim nu kho, bhante, kamanam aggan”ti?
sn3.12:4.1: “Manapapariyantam khvaham, maharaja, pancasu kamagunesu agganti vadami.
sn3.12:4.2: Teva, maharaja, rupa ekaccassa manapa honti, teva rupa ekaccassa amanapa honti.
sn3.12:4.3: Yehi ca yo rupehi attamano hoti paripunnasankappo, so tehi rupehi annam rupam uttaritaram va panitataram va na pattheti.
sn3.12:5.1: Teva, maharaja, sadda ekaccassa manapa honti, teva sadda ekaccassa amanapa honti.
sn3.12:5.2: Yehi ca yo saddehi attamano hoti paripunnasankappo, so tehi saddehi annam saddam uttaritaram va panitataram va na pattheti.
sn3.12:6.1: Teva, maharaja, gandha ekaccassa manapa honti, teva gandha ekaccassa amanapa honti.
sn3.12:6.2: Yehi ca yo gandhehi attamano hoti paripunnasankappo, so tehi gandhehi annam gandham uttaritaram va panitataram va na pattheti.
sn3.12:7.1: Teva, maharaja, rasa ekaccassa manapa honti, teva rasa ekaccassa amanapa honti.
sn3.12:7.2: Yehi ca yo rasehi attamano hoti paripunnasankappo, so tehi rasehi annam rasam uttaritaram va panitataram va na pattheti.
sn3.12:8.1: Teva, maharaja, photthabba ekaccassa manapa honti, teva photthabba ekaccassa amanapa honti.
sn3.12:8.2: Yehi ca yo photthabbehi attamano hoti paripunnasankappo, so tehi photthabbehi annam photthabbam uttaritaram va panitataram va na pattheti.
sn3.12:9.1: Tena kho pana samayena candanangaliko upasako tassam parisayam nisinno hoti.
sn3.12:9.2: Atha kho candanangaliko upasako utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.12:10.1: Atha kho candanangaliko upasako bhagavato sammukha tadanurupaya gathaya abhitthavi:
sn3.12:12.1: Atha kho te panca rajano candanangalikam upasakam pancahi uttarasangehi acchadesum.
sn3.12:12.2: Atha kho candanangaliko upasako tehi pancahi uttarasangehi bhagavantam acchadesiti.
